hadiths.text: Zakariyya bin Yahya informed us, he said:"Abdul-Jabbar bin Al-'Ala' narrated to us, he said: 'Sufyan narrated to us from Ibn Abi Najih, from Tawus, and perhaps it is from Ibn 'Abbas, who said: There is no Ruqba, and whoever gives a gift on the basis of Ruqba, it is part of his estate

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى ابْنِ أَبِي نَجِيحٍ فِي خَبَرِ زَيْدِ بْنِ ثَابِتٍ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Reports From Ibn Abi Najih Concerning The Narration Of Zaid Bin Thabit
